channel.title: Need help with running a server
channel.description:
Hello.
I've played several "moparscape" servers before and also ran a few (just for my own tho). I don't have the experience of coding and that's why I'm looking for a person that has experience for coding & running the server. I have a SERVER ready to use, but not a moparscape server to run on.
We can make a deal and this is serious. Thanks
Contact; MAIL/MSN: deepworldgaming@hotmail.co.uk

item.title: Need help with running a server
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Sanskrit:

You are not allowed to request a coder on these forums, I suggest you read the rules before posting.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with running a server
